data.displayName: Residential Value Saver (Rent customers) - New AGL customers only

fees.description:
Fee may be charged when reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the AGL fee schedules at agl.com.au/fees
Fee may be charged when disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to card payments made at Australia Post outlets
A paper bill fee may apply for each bill sent by post. Includes GST
An over the counter payment fee may apply for payments made in-person at a Post Office. Includes GST
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: Offer only available in areas where AGL operates. For further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au
electricityContract.variation: This plan also includes variable rates, retail fees and charges, which can change at any time with notice to you. If we vary your rates, we will give you at least 5 business days prior notice of the variation. Other charges may be varied with notice

incentives.description: Bonus $100 eGift card for Rent.com.au customers
incentives.displayName: Bonus $100 eGift card for Rent.com.au customers
incentives.eligibility: eGift card is available to residential customers who have opted into RentConnect via Rent.com.au and moved their electricity with AGL. Rent.com.au will email your $100 card after your first 30 days with AGL. Limit of 1 eGift card per customer per 6 months
This is a one-off (GST incl) credit which will appear on your first bill. Customers are eligible for only one upfront credit on an account in any 12 month period. This credit is not transferable

eligibility.information: You must receive bills and other account related communications via your nominated email address for the duration of this Contract. Available to Rent.com.au customers where AGL operates and remain on plan for at least 30 days from sign up. Offer only available to new AGL customers or Move-in customers that sign up online with applicable network tariff

greenPowerCharges.description: For $1 per week inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 20% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.
For 4.4c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Solar bonus scheme pre 30 December 2011 60 cent scheme

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is ongoing. From time to time, AGL reviews its offers and this offer will be reviewed with consideration to AGLu2019s generally available market offers
